meanings.definition: The state or quality of being frigid.
meanings.sent1: The frigidities of the ice made it difficult to walk safely.
meanings.sent2: The frigidities of the room made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent3: Despite the frigidities of the situation, she managed to keep a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The frigidities in their relationship were like an icy barrier between them.
meanings.sent5: The frigidities of the winter night were piercing and unforgiving.
